Name: Poder Oculto
Description:

Effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Power and type are determined by the user's IVs.

Power is given by `x * 40 / 63 + 30`.  `x` is obtained by arranging bit 1 from the IV for each of Special Defense, Special Attack, Speed, Defense, Attack, and HP in that order.  (Bit 1 is 1 if the IV is of the form `4n + 2` or `4n + 3`.  `x` is then 64 * Special Defense IV bit 1, plus 32 * Special Attack IV bit 1, etc.)

Power is always between 30 and 70, inclusive.  Average power is 49.5.

Type is given by `y * 15 / 63`, where `y` is similar to `x` above, except constructed from bit 0.  (Bit 0 is 1 if the IV is odd.)  The result is looked up in the following table.

Value | Type
----: | --------
    0 | fighting
    1 | flying
    2 | poison
    3 | ground
    4 | rock
    5 | bug
    6 | ghost
    7 | steel
    8 | fire
    9 | water
   10 | grass
   11 | electric
   12 | psychic
   13 | ice
   14 | dragon
   15 | dark

This move thus cannot be normal.  Most other types have an equal 1/16 chance to be selected, given random IVs.  However, due to the flooring used here, bug, fighting, and grass appear 5/64 of the time, and dark only 1/64 of the time.

Description:
Picotea al objetivo. Si este sostiene una baya, la
picotea también y obtiene sus efectos.
Effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  If the target is holding a berry, this move has double power, and the user takes the berry and uses it immediately.

If the target is holding a jaboca berry or rowap berry, the berry is still removed, but has no effect.

If this move is super effective and the target is holding a berry that can reduce this move's damage, it will do so, and will not be stolen.

Name: Viento Afín
Description:
Crea un fuerte remolino que aumenta la Velocidad
de los Pokémon de tu equipo durante cuatro
turnos.
Effect: For the next three turns, all Pokémon on the user's side of the field have their original Speed doubled.  This effect remains if the user leaves the field.

Name: Acupresión
Description:
Aplica presión en puntos clave de su cuerpo o de
los aliados para potenciar un parámetro de sus
características.
Effect:
Raises one of the target's stats by two stages.  The raised stat is chosen at random from any stats that can be raised by two stages.  If no stat is eligible, this move will fail.

If the target has a substitute, this move will have no effect, even if the user is the target.

This move cannot be copied by mirror move.

Name: Represión Metal
Description:
Devuelve al objetivo el último ataque recibido,
pero con mucha más fuerza.
Effect: Targets the last opposing Pokémon to hit the user with a damaging move this turn.  Inflicts 1.5× the damage that move did to the user.  If there is no eligible target, this move will fail.  Type immunity applies, but other type effects are ignored.

Name: Ida y Vuelta
Description:
Tras atacar, vuelve a toda prisa para dar paso a
otro Pokémon del equipo.
Effect:
Inflicts regular damage, then the user immediately switches out, and the trainer selects a replacement Pokémon from the party.  If the target faints from this attack, the user's trainer selects the new Pokémon to send out first.  If the user is the last Pokémon in its party that can battle, it will not switch out.

The user may be hit by pursuit when it switches out, if it has been targeted and pursuit has not yet been used.

This move may be used even if the user is under the effect of ingrain.  ingrain's effect will end.

Name: A Bocajarro
Description:
Lucha abiertamente contra el objetivo sin
protegerse. También reduce la Defensa y la
Defensa Especial del usuario.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by one stage each.

Name: Vendetta
Description:
El usuario contraataca con el doble de fuerza si el
objetivo usa un movimiento antes.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage.  If the target uses a move or switches out this turn before this move is used, this move has double power.

Name: Buena Baza
Description:
Si el objetivo ya ha sufrido daño en ese turno, la
fuerza del ataque se duplica.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage.  If the target takes damage this turn for any reason before this move is used, this move has double power.

Name: Embargo
Description:
Impide al objetivo usar el objeto que lleva. Su
Entrenador tampoco puede usar objetos con él.
Effect:
Target cannot use its held item for five turns.  If the target leaves the field, this effect ends.

If a Pokémon under this effect uses bug bite or pluck on a Pokémon holding a berry, the berry is destroyed but not used.  If a Pokémon under this effect uses fling, it will fail.

This effect is passed by baton pass.

Name: Lanzamiento
Description:
Lanza contra el objetivo el objeto que lleva. La
fuerza del ataque y su efecto varían según el
objeto.
Effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Power and type are determined by the user's held item.  The item is consumed.  If the user is not holding an item, or its item has no set type and power, this move will fail.

This move ignores sticky hold.

If the user is under the effect of embargo, this move will fail.

Name: Psicocambio
Description:
Usa su poder mental para transferir al objetivo sus
problemas de estado.
Effect: If the user has a major status effect and the target does not, the user's status is transferred to the target.

Name: As Oculto
Description:
Cuantos menos PP tenga el movimiento, mayor
será la fuerza para atacar.
Effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Power is determined by the PP remaining for this move, after its PP cost is deducted.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.

PP remaining | Power
------------ | ----:
4 or more    |    40
3            |    50
2            |    60
1            |    80
0            |   200

If this move is activated by another move, the activating move's PP is used to calculate power.

Name: Anticura
Description:
Impide al objetivo usar movimientos, habilidades
y objetos equipados que recuperan PS durante
cinco turnos.
Effect: For the next five turns, the target may not use any moves that only restore HP, and move effects that heal the target are disabled.  Moves that steal HP may still be used, but will only inflict damage and not heal the target.

Name: Estrujón
Description:
Estruja con fuerza al objetivo. Cuantos más PS
tenga el objetivo, más fuerza tendrá el ataque.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Power directly relates to the target's relative remaining HP, given by `1 + 120 * current HP / max HP`, to a maximum of 121.

Name: Truco Fuerza
Description:
Usa sus poderes mentales para intercambiar su
característica de Ataque por Defensa.
Effect:
The user's original Attack and Defense are swapped.

This effect is passed on by baton pass.

Name: Bilis
Description:
El usuario arroja sus jugos biliares al objetivo, lo
que anula el efecto de la habilidad en uso.
Effect:
The target's ability is disabled as long as it remains on the field.

This effect is passed on by baton pass.

Name: Conjuro
Description:
Lanza al cielo un conjuro que impide al objetivo
asestar golpes críticos.
Effect: For five turns, opposing Pokémon cannot score critical hits.

Name: Yo Primero
Description:
Se adelanta al movimiento que pretende usar el
objetivo y lo lanza antes con más fuerza. Si el
usuario es más lento, falla.
Effect:
If the target has selected a damaging move this turn, the user will copy that move and use it against the target, with a 50% increase in power.

If the target moves before the user, this move will fail.

This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist, metronome, or sleep talk.

Name: Copión
Description:
Imita el movimiento usado justo antes.
El movimiento falla si no se ha usado aún ninguno.
Effect:
Uses the last move that was used successfully by any Pokémon, including the user.

This move cannot copy itself, nor roar nor whirlwind.

This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist, metronome, or sleep talk.

Name: Cambiafuerza
Description:
El usuario emplea su poder mental para
intercambiar los cambios en Ataque y Ataque
Especial con el objetivo.
Effect: User swaps its Attack and Special Attack stat modifiers modifiers with the target.

Name: Cambiadefensa
Description:
El usuario emplea su poder mental para
intercambiar los cambios en Defensa y
Defensa Especial con el objetivo.
Effect: User swaps its Defense and Special Defense modifiers with the target.

Name: Castigo
Description:
La fuerza del ataque aumenta cuanto más se ha
fortalecido el objetivo con cambios de
características.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Power starts at 60 and is increased by 20 for every stage any of the target's stats has been raised, capping at 200.  Accuracy and evasion modifiers do not increase this move's power.

Name: Última Baza
Description:
Este movimiento solo puede utilizarse tras haber
usado al menos una vez todos los demás
conocidos por el Pokémon.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage.  This move can only be used if each of the user's other moves has been used at least once since the user entered the field.  If this is the user's only move, this move will fail.

Name: Abatidoras
Description:
Se planta una semilla en el objetivo que le causa
pesar. Evita el sueño gracias a la habilidad
Insomnio.
Effect:
Changes the target's ability to insomnia.

If the target's ability is truant or multitype, this move will fail.

Name: Golpe Bajo
Description:
Permite atacar con prioridad. Falla si el objetivo no
está preparando ningún ataque.
Effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  If the target has not selected a damaging move this turn, or if the target has already acted this turn, this move will fail.

This move is not affected by iron fist.

Name: Púas Tóxicas
Description:
Lanza una trampa de púas tóxicas a los pies del
objetivo. El veneno afecta a los Pokémon que
entran en combate.
Effect:
Scatters poisoned spikes around the opposing field, which poison opposing Pokémon that enter the field.  A second layer of these spikes may be laid down, in which case Pokémon will be badly poisoned instead.  Pokémon immune to either ground moves or being poisoned are immune to this effect.  Pokémon otherwise immune to ground moves are affected during gravity.

If a poison Pokémon not immune to ground moves enters a field covered with poisoned spikes, the spikes are removed.

rapid spin will remove this effect from its user's side of the field.  defog will remove this effect from its target's side of the field.

This move does not trigger synchronize, unless the Pokémon with synchronize was forced to enter the field by another effect such as roar.

Pokémon entering the field due to baton pass are not affected by this effect.

Name: Cambia Almas
Description:
Usa la fuerza mental para intercambiar con el
objetivo los cambios en las características.
Effect: User swaps its stat modifiers with the target.

Name: Acua Aro
Description:
Un manto de agua cubre al Pokémon que lo usa.
Recupera algunos PS en cada turno.
Effect:
Restores 1/16 of the user's max HP at the end of each turn.  If the user leaves the field, this effect ends.

This effect is passed on by baton pass.

Name: Levitón
Description:
Levita gracias a un campo magnético generado por
electricidad durante cinco turnos.
Effect:
For five turns, the user is immune to ground moves.

If the user is under the effect of ingrain or has levitate, this move will fail.

This effect is temporarily disabled by and cannot be used during gravity.

This effect is passed on by baton pass.

Name: Envite Ígneo
Description:
El Pokémon se cubre de llamas y carga contra el
objetivo, aunque él también recibe daños. Puede
quemar.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.  Has a 10% chance to burn the target.  Frozen Pokémon may use this move, in which case they will thaw.

Name: Palmeo
Description:
Ataca al objetivo con una onda de choque y
puede llegar a paralizarlo.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

Name: Esfera Aural
Description:
Libera una descarga de la fuerza del aura desde
su interior. Es infalible.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.

Name: Pulimento
Description:
Reduce la resistencia puliendo su cuerpo. Aumenta
la Velocidad considerablemente.
Effect: Raises the user's Speed by two stages.

Name: Puya Nociva
Description:
Pincha al objetivo con un tentáculo o brazo
envenenado. Puede llegar a envenenar al objetivo.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

Name: Pulso Umbrío
Description:
Libera una horrible aura llena de malos
pensamientos y puede hacer retroceder al objetivo.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.

Name: Tajo Umbrío
Description:
Ataca al objetivo a la primera oportunidad. Suele
ser crítico.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.

Name: Acua Cola
Description:
Ataca agitando la cola como si fuera una ola
rabiosa en una tormenta devastadora.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage.

Name: Bomba Germen
Description:
Lanza al objetivo una descarga de semillas
explosivas desde arriba.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage.

Name: Tajo Aéreo
Description:
Ataca con una hoja de aire que incluso corta el
cielo. También puede hacer retroceder al objetivo.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

Name: Tijera X
Description:
Cruza las guadañas o las garras para atacar al
objetivo como si fueran unas tijeras.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage.

Name: Zumbido
Description:
El movimiento de las alas crea una onda sónica
dañina. También puede disminuir la Defensa
Especial del objetivo.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.

Name: Pulso Dragón
Description:
Abre mucho la boca y libera una onda de choque
que ataca al objetivo.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage.

Name: Carga Dragón
Description:
Ataca de forma brutal mientras intimida al objetivo.
También puede hacerlo retroceder.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.

Name: Joya de Luz
Description:
Ataca con un rayo de luz que centellea como si lo
formaran miles de joyas.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage.

Name: Puño Drenaje
Description:
Un golpe que drena energía. El Pokémon recupera
la mitad de los PS arrebatados al objetivo.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Drains half the damage inflicted to heal the user.

Name: Onda Vacío
Description:
Gira los puños y libera una onda de vacío contra
el objetivo. Este movimiento siempre va primero.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage.

Name: Onda Certera
Description:
Agudiza la concentración mental y libera su poder.
Puede disminuir la Defensa Especial del objetivo.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.

Name: Energibola
Description:
Aúna fuerzas de la naturaleza y libera su ataque.
Puede disminuir la Defensa Especial del objetivo.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.

Name: Pájaro Osado
Description:
Pliega sus alas y ataca con un vuelo rasante. El
Pokémon que lo usa también resulta seriamente
dañado.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

Name: Tierra Viva
Description:
La tierra a los pies del objetivo erupciona
violentamente. Puede disminuir la Defensa Especial
del objetivo.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.

Name: Trapicheo
Description:
Intercambia con el objetivo los objetos que llevan
tan rápido que es imposible verlo a simple vista.
Effect:
User and target permanently swap held items.  Works even if one of the Pokémon isn't holding anything.  If either Pokémon is holding mail, this move will fail.

If either Pokémon has multitype or sticky hold, this move will fail.

If this move results in a Pokémon obtaining choice band, choice scarf, or choice specs, and that Pokémon was the latter of the pair to move this turn, then the move it used this turn becomes its chosen forced move.  This applies even if both Pokémon had a choice item before this move was used.  If the first of the two Pokémon gains a choice item, it may select whatever choice move it wishes next turn.

Neither the user nor the target can recover its item with recycle.

This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.

Name: Gigaimpacto
Description:
Carga contra el objetivo usando toda la fuerza que
tiene. El Pokémon descansa el turno siguiente.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.

Name: Maquinación
Description:
Estimula su cerebro pensando en cosas malas.
Aumenta considerablemente el Ataque Especial.
Effect: Raises the user's Special Attack by two stages.

Name: Puño Bala
Description:
Ataca con fuertes puñetazos tan rápidos como
proyectiles. Este movimiento siempre va primero.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage.

Name: Alud
Description:
Este ataque inflige el doble de daño a un objetivo
que haya golpeado al usuario en ese mismo turno.
Effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  If the target damaged the user this turn and was the last to do so, this move has double power.

pain split does not count as damaging the user.

Name: Canto Helado
Description:
Crea bolas de hielo y las lanza a gran velocidad.
Este movimiento siempre va primero.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage.

Name: Garra Umbría
Description:
Ataca con una garra afilada hecha de sombras.
Suele ser crítico.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.

Name: Colmillo Rayo
Description:
Usa colmillos electrificados para morder. Puede
hacer que el objetivo retroceda o se paralice.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target and a separate 10% chance to make the target flinch.

Name: Colmillo Hielo
Description:
Usa colmillos helados para morder. Puede hacer
que el objetivo retroceda o se congele.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to freeze the target and a separate 10% chance to make the target flinch.

Name: Colmillo Ígneo
Description:
Usa colmillos en llamas para morder. Puede hacer
que el objetivo retroceda o reciba quemaduras.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to burn the target and a separate 10% chance to make the target flinch.

Name: Sombra Vil
Description:
Extiende su sombra y ataca al objetivo por la
espalda. Este movimiento siempre va primero.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage.

Name: Bomba Fango
Description:
Ataca lanzando una compacta bola de fango.
Puede bajar la Precisión del objetivo.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by one stage.

Name: Psicocorte
Description:
Ataca al objetivo con cuchillas formadas por
energía psíquica. Suele ser crítico.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.

Name: Cabezazo Zen
Description:
Concentra su energía psíquica en la cabeza para
golpear. Puede hacer que el objetivo retroceda.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch.

Name: Disparo Espejo
Description:
El usuario libera un haz de energía desde su
pulido cuerpo. Puede bajar la Precisión.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by one stage.

Name: Foco Resplandor
Description:
El usuario concentra toda la luz del cuerpo y la
libera. Puede bajar la Defensa Especial del
objetivo.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.

Name: Treparrocas
Description:
Ataca con una gran embestida. Puede confundir al
objetivo.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 20% chance to confuse the target.

Name: Despejar
Description:
Potente viento que barre el Reflejo o Pantalla de
Luz del objetivo y puede reducir su Evasión.
Effect:
Lowers the target's evasion by one stage.  Clears away fog.  Removes the effects of mist, light screen, reflect, safeguard, spikes, stealth rock, and toxic spikes from the target's side of the field.

If the target is protected by mist, it will prevent the evasion change, then be removed by this move.

Name: Espacio Raro
Description:
Se crea un espacio extraño en el que los Pokémon
lentos se mueven primero durante cinco turnos.
Effect:
For five turns (including this one), slower Pokémon will act before faster Pokémon.  Move priority is not affected.  Using this move when its effect is already active will end the effect.

Pokémon holding full incense, lagging tail, or quick claw and Pokémon with stall ignore this effect.

Name: Cometa Draco
Description:
Hace que grandes cometas caigan del cielo sobre
el objetivo. Baja mucho el Ataque Especial del
que lo usa.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user's Special Attack by two stages.

Name: Chispazo
Description:
Una deslumbradora onda eléctrica afecta a los
Pokémon que hay combatiendo alrededor. Puede
paralizar.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

Name: Humareda
Description:
Un infierno de llamas daña a los Pokémon
adyacentes en combate. Puede quemar.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to burn the target.

Name: Lluevehojas
Description:
Cae una lluvia de hojas afiladas. Baja mucho el
Ataque Especial de quien lo usa.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user's Special Attack by two stages.

Name: Latigazo
Description:
El usuario agita violentamente sus lianas o
tentáculos para golpear al objetivo.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage.

Name: Romperrocas
Description:
Lanza una piedra enorme contra el objetivo, pero
tiene que descansar el siguiente turno.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.

Name: Veneno X
Description:
Tajo que puede envenenar al objetivo. Suele ser
crítico.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move. Has a 10% chance to poison the target.

Name: Lanzamugre
Description:
Lanza contra el objetivo basura asquerosa. Puede
envenenar al objetivo.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

Name: Cabeza de Hierro
Description:
Ataca con su dura cabeza de hierro. Puede hacer
que el objetivo retroceda.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

Name: Bomba Imán
Description:
Lanza unas bombas de hierro que se pegan al
adversario. No se puede esquivar.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Ignores accuracy and evasion modifiers.

Name: Roca Afilada
Description:
Clava piedras muy afiladas al objetivo. Suele ser 
crítico.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.

Name: Seducción
Description:
Si el objetivo es del sexo opuesto, queda
embelesado y baja mucho su Ataque Especial.
Effect: Lowers the target's Special Attack by two stages.  If the user and target are the same gender, or either is genderless, this move will fail.

Name: Trampa Rocas
Description:
Una trampa de rocas que flota en el aire y daña a
los objetivos que entran en combate.
Effect:
Spreads sharp rocks around the opposing field, damaging any Pokémon that enters the field for 1/8 its max HP.  This damage is affected by the entering Pokémon's susceptibility to rock moves.

rapid spin removes this effect from its user's side of the field.

Name: Hierba Lazo
Description:
Enreda al objetivo con hierba y lo derriba.
Cuanto más pesado es el objetivo, más daño
inflige.
Effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Power increases with the target's weight in kilograms, to a maximum of 120.

Target's weight | Power
--------------- | ----:
Up to 10kg      |    20
Up to 25kg      |    40
Up to 50kg      |    60
Up to 100kg     |    80
Up to 200kg     |   100
Above 200kg     |   120

Name: Cháchara
Description:
Ataca con una onda sónica compuesta por
palabras que ha aprendido y confunde al objetivo.
Effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  Has either a 1%, 11%, or 31% chance to confuse the target, based on the volume of the recording made for this move; louder recordings increase the chance of confusion.  If the user is not a chatot, this move will not cause confusion.

This move cannot be copied by mimic, mirror move, or sketch, nor selected by assist, metronome, or sleep talk.

Name: Sentencia
Description:
Emite incontables haces de luz. Varía según el tipo
de tabla que lleve el usuario.
Effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  If the user is holding a plate or a drive, this move's type is the type corresponding to that item.

Note: This effect is technically shared by both techno blast and judgment; however, Techno Blast is only affected by drives, and Judgment is only affected by plates.

Name: Picadura
Description:
Pica al objetivo. Si el objetivo lleva una baya, el
usuario se la come y se beneficia de su efecto.
Effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  If the target is holding a berry, this move has double power, and the user takes the berry and uses it immediately.

If the target is holding a jaboca berry or rowap berry, the berry is still removed, but has no effect.

If this move is super effective and the target is holding a berry that can reduce this move's damage, it will do so, and will not be stolen.

Name: Rayo Carga
Description:
Lanza un rayo eléctrico contra el objetivo. Puede
subir el Ataque Especial de quien lo usa.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 70% chance to raise the user's Special Attack by one stage.

Name: Mazazo
Description:
Arremete contra el objetivo con su robusto cuerpo.
El agresor también sufre bastante daño.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/3 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

Name: Acua Jet
Description: Ataque rápido que permite golpear en primer lugar.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage.

Name: Al Ataque
Description:
El usuario llama a sus súbditos para que ataquen
al objetivo. Suele ser crítico.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.

Name: A Defender
Description:
El usuario llama a sus súbditos para que formen
un escudo viviente. Sube la Defensa y la Defensa
Especial.
Effect: Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by one stage.

Name: Auxilio
Description:
El usuario llama a sus súbditos para que lo curen.
Recupera hasta la mitad de los PS máximos.
Effect: Heals the user for half its max HP.

Name: Testarazo
Description:
El usuario arriesga su vida y lanza un cabezazo
con toda su fuerza. El agresor resulta seriamente
dañado.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/2 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

Name: Doble Golpe
Description:
Golpea al objetivo dos veces seguidas con la cola
u otras partes de su cuerpo.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Hits twice in one turn.

Name: Distorsión
Description:
Ataca al objetivo usando tal energía que el tiempo
se distorsiona. El usuario descansa el siguiente
turno.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.

Name: Corte Vacío
Description:
Desgarra al objetivo y el espacio a su alrededor.
Suele ser crítico.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage.  User's critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move.

Name: Danza Lunar
Description:
El usuario se debilita, pero el Pokémon que lo
sustituye recupera su estado, los PS y los PP.
Effect: User faints.  Its replacement's HP and PP are fully restored, and any major status effect is removed.

Name: Agarrón
Description:
Estruja al objetivo con gran fuerza. Cuantos más
PS le queden al objetivo, más fuerte será el
ataque.
Effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Power directly relates to the target's relative remaining HP, given by `1 + 120 * current HP / max HP`, to a maximum of 121.

Name: Lluvia Ígnea
Description:
El objetivo queda atrapado en una tormenta de

Una onda de choque se libera del cuerpo. Puede

El usuario se afila las garras para aumentar su

El usuario emplea sus poderes para hacer la media

If the user's ally switches out, opposing Pokémon may still hit it with pursuit.

This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.

gust, hurricane, sky uppercut, smack down, thunder, twister, and whirlwind can hit both the user and the target during this effect.  gust and twister will additionally have double power.
